hero.title: Track the Carbon Footprint of Your Municipality
hero.text: How can we improve what we cannot measure? MyCityCO2, a free and open-source tool for tracking the carbon footprints of 2172 Swiss municipalities in the fight against climate change. The long-term climate strategy is based on the revised CO2 law and the objectives it contains.
